borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The proposed development, by reason of scale and siting, would result in an unacceptable overbearing impact on 51 Treswell Road, therefore constitute harm to the dwelling's amenity, which is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p>- National Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023);</p><p> - Policies D4 &amp; D8 of the London Plan (March 2021); </p><p>- Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</p><p> - Policies BP8 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</p><p> - Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021);</p><p> - The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham's Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).<br></p></div>

The proposed development, by reason of siting and design, would result in unacceptable harm to the appearance of the original dwelling and the terrace row, increase a sense of closure at this prominent corner plot, and be disruptive to the street scene and local character, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. Therefore, the proposed development is contrary to:

- National Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023);

- Policy D1, D6 & HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021);

- Policies CP2, CP3 & CR2 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);

- Policies BP2 & BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);

- Policies SP2/4, SPP6 & DMD1/4/6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021);

- The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey side extension, single storey front extension and a single storey rear extension
